Name: Goppinath
AboutMe:
I am simply influenced by the "concepts of computer programming" and I am a strict design pattern guy who trusts “program to an interface, not an implementation”. Furthermore the efficiency matters much more than that my code simply works.

Unfortunately, I can answer the questions during weekends only, because I have already dedicated my working hours only to my employer.

Mostly I am trying to give the solution + explanation which helps the readers to understand the problem and the solution clearly and much more important that they should not make the same mistake again.

"My answers should be the full stop for them rather a comma."

Would you like to get to know me more...? just visit my home page goppinath.com
